description: This stop is not mentioned in the literature; we assume it to be a form of Dulzian with wooden (holz) resonators.
examplesDescription: Seven examples have been found in

examples.name: Holzdulzian 16', Swell; St. John Lutheran Church, Knoxville, Tennesee, USA; Berghaus Organ Company, Bellwood Illinois, USA, 1992.
Holzdulzian 16' Oberwerk; Klosterkirche, Huysburg, Denmark; VEB Orgelbau Eule, Bautzen, 1983.
Holzdulzian 16', Oberwerk; Schauspielhauses, Berlin, Germany; Jehmlich.
